这是一个粗略的等同于：
It is not possible to re-include a file if a parent directory of that file is excluded.
如果该文件的父目录被排除，则不可能重新包含文件。
It is possible that a merge failure will prevent this process from being completely automatic.
合并失败可能会阻止此过程完全自动化。
It is probably not the command you want to use; see "save" above.
它可能不是您想要使用的命令；参见上面的“保存”。
It is typically run after <e1>git merge</e1>.
它通常在 <e1>git merge</e1> 之后运行。
It is used by several Git commands when, on interactive mode, an editor is to be launched.
当在交互模式下，编辑器将被启动时，它被几个 Git 命令使用。
It may be given as a branch name, a commit-id, or a tag.
它可以作为分支名称，提交 ID 或标签来给出。

It only adds the content of the specified file(s) at the time the add command is run; if you want subsequent changes included in the next commit, then you must run <c0>git add</c0> again to add the new content to the index.
它只在运行 add 命令时添加指定文件的内容;如果要下次提交中包含的后续更改，则必须再次运行 <c0>git add</c0> 以将新内容添加到索引。
It provides a bidirectional flow of changes between a Subversion and a Git repository.
它提供 Subversion 和 Git 仓库之间的双向变更流程。
It rewrites history, which does not bode well when you published that history already.
它重写历史，当你已经发表了这个历史时，这不是很好。

It shows that foo.png has differences from HEAD (but that is binary so line count cannot be shown) and there is no difference between indexed copy and the working tree version (if the working tree version were also different, <e0>binary</e0> would have been shown in place of <e1>nothing</e1>).
它显示 foo.png 与 HEAD 有差异(但是二进制，因此不能显示行数)，并且索引副本和工作树版本之间没有差异(如果工作树版本也不同，<e0> binary </e0>将被显示代替 <e1>nothing</e1> )。

It typically adds the current content of existing paths as a whole, but with some options it can also be used to add content with only part of the changes made to the working tree files applied, or remove paths that do not exist in the working tree anymore.
它通常将现有路径的当前内容作为一个整体添加，但是通过一些选项，它也可以用于仅添加对应用的工作树文件所做更改的一部分内容，或移除工作树中不存在的路径了。
It updates the named paths in the working tree from the index file or from a named <tree-ish> (most often a commit).
它从索引文件或指定的<tree-ish>(通常是提交)更新工作树中的指定路径。
It uses what is called an <e1>extended SHA-1</e1> syntax.
它使用所谓的 <e1>extended SHA-1</e1> 语法。
It will not exclude the current working directory or a GIT_DIR set on the command line or in the environment.
它不会排除当前工作目录或在命令行或环境中设置的 GIT_DIR 。
It will not overwrite things that are already there.
它不会覆盖已经存在的东西。
It won’t affect existing index files.
它不会影响现有的索引文件。
It works a little bit like printf format, with the notable exception that you get a newline with <e1>%n</e1> instead of <e2>\n</e2>.
它的工作原理有点像 printf 格式，唯一的例外是你使用 <e1>%n</e1> 而不是 <e2>\n</e2> 来获取一个换行符。
Iterate over all refs that match <c0><pattern></c0> and show them according to the given <c1><format></c1>, after sorting them according to the given set of <c2><key></c2>.
迭代所有匹配 <c0><pattern></c0> 的引用，按给定 <c2><key></c2> 排序后，按给定的 <c1><format></c1> 显示它们。
Its argument must be an <e0>exact</e0> entry (e.g. "<c1>git reflog delete master@{2}</c1>").
其参数必须是 <e0>exact</e0> 条目(例如 "<c1>git reflog delete master@{2}</c1>")。
Its default value is $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/git/ignore.
其默认值为 $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/git/ignore。
Join two or more development histories together
合并两个或多个开发历史
Just in case if you are doing something exotic, it should be noted that all of the <commit> in the above description, except in the last two forms that use ".." notations, can be any <tree>.
为了防止异常情况发生，请注意，上述描述中的所有<commit>除了使用".."符号的最后两种形式都可以是任何<tree>。
Keep changes in working tree while discarding some previous commits
在删除一些以前的提交时，保持工作树中的更改
Keeping a patch series up to date using git rebase
使用 git rebase 保持最新的补丁系列
Leading and trailing whitespaces are ignored.
前导和尾随的空白被忽略。
Lets you rewrite Git revision history by rewriting the branches mentioned in the <rev-list options>, applying custom filters on each revision.
让您通过重写 <rev-list options> 中提到的分支来重写 Git 修订历史记录，在每个修订版本上应用自定义过滤器。
Like --allow-empty this command is primarily for use by foreign SCM interface scripts.
像 --allow-empty 这个命令主要是由外部 SCM 接口脚本使用的。
Like --get-all, but interprets the name as a regular expression and writes out the key names.
像 --get-all 一样，但将该名称解释为正则表达式并写出关键名称。
Like <c0>GIT_CEILING_DIRECTORIES</c0>, this will not affect an explicit repository directory set via <c1>GIT_DIR</c1> or on the command line.
像 <c0>GIT_CEILING_DIRECTORIES</c0> 一样，这不会影响通过 <c1>GIT_DIR</c1> 或命令行设置的显式仓库目录。
Like <c0>pop</c0>, but do not remove the state from the stash list.
像 <c0>pop</c0> 一样，但是不要从该隐藏列表中移除该状态。
Like <e0>-C</e0>, but with <c1>-c</c1> the editor is invoked, so that the user can further edit the commit message.
如同 <e0>-C</e0> ，但是使用 <c1>-c</c1> 会调用编辑器，以便用户可以进一步编辑提交消息。
Like get, but returns all values for a multi-valued key.
类似 get，但返回多值键的所有值。
Like with using <c2>rm filename</c2>, <c3>git rm --cached filename</c3> will fail if the file is absent from the tree of a commit.
像使用 <c2>rm filename</c2> 一样，如果文件不在提交的树中，那么 <c3>git rm --cached filename</c3> 将失败。
Likewise for any other integration branches e.g. <c1>maint</c1>, <c2>next</c2> and <c3>pu</c3> (potential updates).
对于任何其他集成分支，例如， <c1>maint</c1> ， <c2>next</c2> 和 <c3>pu</c3> (潜在更新)。
Likewise, you can pretend that mothership "fetched" from you (useful when access is one sided).
同样，你可以假装母机从你获取(当访问是单面的时候很有用)。

通常分支合并的是远程存储库的 HEAD，但选择由 branch.<name>.remote 和 branch.<name>.merge 选项确定；详见 <a0>git-config[1]</a0> 。
Normally, Git has to read the entries in this list and resolve any symlink that might be present in order to compare them with the current directory.
通常，Git 必须读取此列表中的条目，并解析可能存在的任何符号链接，以便将其与当前目录进行比较。
Normally, only files unknown to Git are removed, but if the <c0>-x</c0> option is specified, ignored files are also removed.
通常，只有 Git 未知的文件被删除，但是如果指定了 <c0>-x</c0> 选项，那么也会删除被忽略的文件。

Note that <c0>--force</c0> applies to all the refs that are pushed, hence using it with <c1>push.default</c1> set to <c2>matching</c2> or with multiple push destinations configured with <c3>remote.*.push</c3> may overwrite refs other than the current branch (including local refs that are strictly behind their remote counterpart).
请注意， <c0>--force</c0> 适用于所有推送的引用，因此使用 <c1>push.default</c1> 设置为 <c2>matching</c2> 或多个推送目的地配置为 <c3>remote.*.push</c3> 可能会覆盖除当前分支之外的引用(包括严格在其远程对应方之后的本地引用)。
Note that <c0>git --help ...</c0> is identical to <c1>git help ...</c1> because the former is internally converted into the latter.
请注意， <c0>git --help ...</c0> 与 <c1>git help ...</c1> 相同，因为前者被内部转换为后者。

Note that any commits in HEAD which introduce the same textual changes as a commit in HEAD..<upstream> are omitted (i.e., a patch already accepted upstream with a different commit message or timestamp will be skipped).
请注意，如果 HEAD 中的任何提交，引入了与 HEAD..<upstream> 中某个提交相同的文本更改，该提交将被忽略(即，已经接受上游具有不同提交消息或时间戳的补丁将被跳过)。
Note that extra commits can be shown to give a meaningful history.
请注意，额外的提交可以显示，以提供有意义的历史。
Note that older versions of Git used to ignore removed files; use <c8>--no-all</c8> option if you want to add modified or new files but ignore removed ones.
请注意，旧版本的 Git 用于忽略删除的文件;如果要添加修改或新文件但忽略删除的文件，请使用 <c8>--no-all</c8> 选项。
Note that omitting the <c0>=</c0> in <c1>git -c foo.bar ...</c1> is allowed and sets <c2>foo.bar</c2> to the boolean true value (just like <c3>[foo]bar</c3> would in a config file).
请注意，省略 <c1>git -c foo.bar ...</c1> 中的 <c0>=</c0> 是允许的，并将 <c2>foo.bar</c2> 设置为布尔值 true （就像 <c3>[foo]bar</c3>）。
Note that the argument to --onto and the <upstream> parameter can be any valid commit-ish.
请注意，--onto 和<upstream>参数可以是任何有效的 commit-ish。

Note that the asterisk <c0>*</c0> is quoted from the shell in this example; this lets Git, and not the shell, expand the pathnames of files and subdirectories under the <c1>Documentation/</c1> directory.
请注意，本示例中 shell 的星号 <c0>*</c0> 是引用的（译注：加了 \），这让 Git 而不是 shell 扩展了 <c1>Documentation/</c1> 目录下的文件和子目录的路径名。
Note that the asterisk <c0>*</c0> is quoted from the shell in this example; this lets the command include the files from subdirectories of <c1>Documentation/</c1> directory.
请注意，本示例中的 shell 星号 <c0>*</c0> 是引用的，这允许命令包含来自 <c1>Documentation/</c1> 目录的子目录的文件。（译注 * 将只匹配目录下的文件，\* 会包括子目录）
Note that the latter does not mean <c0>maint</c0> and everything between <c1>master</c1> and <c2>next</c2>; specifically, <c3>maint</c3> will not be used if it is included in <c4>master</c4>.
请注意，后者并不意味着 <c0>maint</c0> 以及 <c1>master</c1> 和 <c2>next</c2> 之间的所有内容。具体而言，如果包含在 <c4>master</c4> 中，则不会使用 <c3>maint</c3> 。

Note that the listed commits may not necessarily be the list of the <s4>direct</s4> parent commits if you have limited your view of history: for example, if you are only interested in changes related to a certain directory or file.
请注意，列出的提交可能不一定是 <s4>direct</s4> 父提交的列表，如果您限制了您的历史记录视图：例如，如果您只对与某个目录或文件相关的更改感兴趣。
Note that these are applied before commit ordering and formatting options, such as <c0>--reverse</c0>.
请注意，这些将在提交订单和格式化选项（例如 <c0>--reverse</c0> ）之前应用。
Note that this also affects options like <c0>--replace-all</c0> and <c1>--unset</c1>.
请注意，这也会影响选项，如 <c0>--replace-all</c0> 和 <c1>--unset</c1> 。

请注意，此 diff 输出没有前缀为 <e0>#</e0> 的行。

以下一个或多个选项可用于确定显示的文件：
One use is to give submodules context about the superproject that invoked it.
一个用途是给子模块关于调用它的超项目的上下文。
Only print error and warning messages; all other output will be suppressed.
只打印错误和警告信息;所有其他输出将被抑制。
Only the existing values that match the regexp are updated or unset.
只有与正则表达式匹配的现有值会更新或取消设置。
Only valid setting is "--unified=??" or "-u??" to set the number of context lines shown when a unified diff is created.
有效的设置只有 "--unified=??" 或 "-u??" ，设置创建统一差异时显示的上下文行数。
Open the diff vs. the index in an editor and let the user edit it.
在编辑器中打开 diff 与索引，让用户编辑它。
Opens an editor to modify the specified config file; either <c0>--system</c0>, <c1>--global</c1>, or repository (default).
打开编辑器修改指定的配置文件; <c0>--system</c0> ， <c1>--global</c1> 或仓库(默认)。
Operate quietly.
安静地操作。
Option <c1>-r</c1> causes the remote-tracking branches to be listed, and option <c2>-a</c2> shows both local and remote branches.
选项 <c1>-r</c1> 导致列出远程跟踪分支，选项 <c2>-a</c2> 显示本地和远程分支。

Otherwise <author> is assumed to be a pattern and is used to search for an existing commit by that author (i.e. rev-list --all -i --author=<author>); the commit author is then copied from the first such commit found.
否则，<author>被假定为模式，用于搜索该作者的现有提交(即 rev-list --all -i --author=<author>);然后从发现的第一个这样的提交中复制提交作者。
Otherwise <c1>whitespace</c1>.
否则与 <c1>whitespace</c1> 相同。
Otherwise HEAD will be reset to where it was when the rebase operation was started.
否则 HEAD 将重新设置为在 rebase 操作启动时的位置。
Otherwise all tracked files are compared.
否则所有跟踪的文件都被比较。
Otherwise it remains on the current branch.
否则它将留在当前分支上。
Otherwise just a tag reference for the SHA-1 object name of the commit object is created (i.e. a lightweight tag).
否则，将创建提交对象的 SHA-1对象名称的标签引用(即轻量级标记)。
Otherwise, Git treats the pattern as a shell glob suitable for consumption by fnmatch(3) with the FNM_PATHNAME flag: wildcards in the pattern will not match a / in the pathname.
否则，Git 将模式视为适合 fnmatch(3) 使用 FNM_PATHNAME 标志的 shell glob：模式中的通配符与路径名中的 / 不匹配。
Otherwise, all information (including original commit times or merge information) will be preserved.
否则，将保留所有信息(包括原始提交时间或合并信息)。
Otherwise, apply the changes introduced by those commits that are in next but not HEAD to the current branch, creating a new commit for each new change.
否则，将 next 中但在 HEAD 的提交引入的更改应用于当前分支，为每个新的更改创建一个新的提交。
Otherwise, if it refers to a valid commit, your HEAD becomes "detached" and you are no longer on any branch (see below for details).
否则，如果它引用一个有效的提交，您的 HEAD 变为"分离"，并且您不再处于任何分支(有关详细信息，请参阅下文)。
Otherwise, it suffixes the tag name with the number of additional commits on top of the tagged object and the abbreviated object name of the most recent commit.
否则，它将标签名称与标签对象之上的附加提交数量以及最近提交的缩写对象名称后缀。
Output diff in reverse.
反向输出 diff。
Output from <c0>git describe</c0>; i.e. a closest tag, optionally followed by a dash and a number of commits, followed by a dash, a <e1>g</e1>, and an abbreviated object name.
来自 <c0>git describe</c0> ;即最接近的标签，可选地后跟一个破折号和提交数，后跟一个破折号，一个 <e1>g</e1> 和一个缩写的对象名称。
Output information on each ref
输出每个引用的信息
Output only the names of config variables for <c0>--list</c0> or <c1>--get-regexp</c1>.
仅输出配置变量名称为 <c0>--list</c0> 或 <c1>--get-regexp</c1> 。
Override earlier --rebase.
覆盖之前的 --rebase 。
Override the author date used in the commit.
覆盖提交中使用的作者日期。
Override the commit author.
覆盖提交作者。
Override the executable bit of the added files.
覆盖添加文件的可执行位。
Override the up-to-date check.
覆盖最新的检查。
Overrides merge.verbosity.
覆盖 merge.verbosity。

一部分 <a0>git[1]</a0> 套件

将配置参数传递给命令。

补丁工作流程

可以将补丁指定为文件，目录(将在目录中发送所有文件)，或直接作为修订列表。

Path to wherever your core Git programs are installed.
核心 Git 程序的安装路径。
Paths in which the change applied cleanly are updated both in the index file and in your working tree.
更改应用于的文件，在索引文件和工作树中都更新。
Paths may need to be prefixed with ‘`-- '’ to separate them from options or the revision range, when confusion arises.
当混乱出现时，路径可能需要以 ‘`-- '’ 来作为前缀，以将其与选项或修订版本区分开来。
Paths relative to the directory prefix will be matched against that pattern using fnmatch(3); in particular, <e0>*</e0> and <e1>?</e1> <e2>can</e2> match directory separators.
相对于目录前缀的路径将使用 fnmatch(3) 与该模式匹配;特别是， <e0>*</e0> 和 <e1>?</e1> <e2>可以</e2> 匹配目录分隔符。

Pathspecs are used on the command line of "git ls-files", "git ls-tree", "git add", "git grep", "git diff", "git checkout", and many other commands to limit the scope of operations to some subset of the tree or worktree.
Pathspecs 用于 "git ls-files"，"git ls-tree"，"git add"，"git grep"，"git diff"，"git checkout" 以及许多其他命令，用来在命令行上限制操作范围到树或工作树的某个子集。
Pattern used to limit paths in Git commands.
用于限制 Git 命令中路径的模式。
Patterns are lists of one or more search expressions separated by newline characters.
模式是由换行符分隔的一个或多个搜索表达式的列表。
Patterns in the exclude file are used in addition to those in info/exclude.
除了 info/exclude 中的模式外，还使用排除文件中的模式。
Patterns read from <c0>$GIT_DIR/info/exclude</c0>.
从 <c0>$GIT_DIR/info/exclude</c0> 读取的模式。

Patterns read from a <c0>.gitignore</c0> file in the same directory as the path, or in any parent directory, with patterns in the higher level files (up to the toplevel of the work tree) being overridden by those in lower level files down to the directory containing the file.
从路径相同目录（或任何父目录）中的 <c0>.gitignore</c0> 文件读取的模式，较高级别的文件中的模式（上至工作树的顶层）被较低级别文件中的模式覆盖（下至包含该文件的目录）。
Patterns read from the command line for those commands that support them.
从支持 gitignore 命令的命令行读取的模式。
Patterns read from the file specified by the configuration variable <c0>core.excludesFile</c0>.
从配置变量 <c0>core.excludesFile</c0> 指定的文件中读取模式。
Patterns that begin with a double quote are quoted in C style.
以双引号开头的模式以 C 风格引用。

Patterns which a user wants Git to ignore in all situations (e.g., backup or temporary files generated by the user’s editor of choice) generally go into a file specified by <c0>core.excludesFile</c0> in the user’s <c1>~/.gitconfig</c1>.
用户希望 Git 在所有情况下忽略的模式(例如，由用户选择的编辑器生成的备份或临时文件)，通常会转到用户的 <c1>~/.gitconfig</c1> 中由 <c0>core.excludesFile</c0> 指定的文件。

Patterns which are specific to a particular repository but which do not need to be shared with other related repositories (e.g., auxiliary files that live inside the repository but are specific to one user’s workflow) should go into the <c0>$GIT_DIR/info/exclude</c0> file.
特定仓库特定的但不需要与其他相关仓库共享的模式(例如，存储在仓库中但是特定于一个用户工作流程的辅助文件)，应该进入 <c0>$GIT_DIR/info/exclude</c0> 文件。
Patterns which should be version-controlled and distributed to other repositories via clone (i.e., files that all developers will want to ignore) should go into a <c0>.gitignore</c0> file.
应该受版本控制及通过克隆分发到其他存储库的模式(即所有开发人员想要忽略的文件)，应该进入 <c0>.gitignore</c0> 文件。

Pretty-print the contents of the commit logs in a given format, where <e0><format></e0> can be one of <e1>oneline</e1>, <e2>short</e2>, <e3>medium</e3>, <e4>full</e4>, <e5>fuller</e5>, <e6>email</e6>, <e7>raw</e7>, <e8>format:<string></e8> and <e9>tformat:<string></e9>.

Reference logs, or "reflogs", record when the tips of branches and other references were updated in the local repository.
当本地仓库中的分支尖端和其他引用的更新时，引用日志或称 "reflogs" 将记录。
Reflogs are useful in various Git commands, to specify the old value of a reference.
Reflogs 可用于各种 Git 命令，以指定引用的旧值。
Refs with names beginning <c0>ref/head/</c0> contain the SHA-1 name of the most recent commit (or "head") of a branch under development.
以 <c0>ref/head/</c0> 开头的引用包含正在开发的分支的最近提交(或"头")的 SHA-1 名称。

将工作树中的文件内容注册到索引

正则表达式匹配当前是区分大小写的，并且对于 section 和变量名小写规范版本的 key，但子 section 名称没有。

Resets the index and updates the files in the working tree that are different between <commit> and HEAD, but keeps those which are different between the index and working tree (i.e. which have changes which have not been added).
重置索引并更新工作树中不同于<commit>和 HEAD 之间的文件，但保留索引和工作树之间不同的文件(即哪些具有尚未添加的更改)。
Resets the index and working tree.

Resets the index but not the working tree (i.e., the changed files are preserved but not marked for commit) and reports what has not been updated.

Set a configuration variable in the newly-created repository; this takes effect immediately after the repository is initialized, but before the remote history is fetched or any files checked out.
在新创建的存储库中设置配置变量;这在存储库初始化之后，但在获取远程历史记录或任何文件签出之前立即生效。
Set a prefix which gives a path from above a repository down to its root.
设置一个前缀，该前缀从仓库上方到达根目录。
Set the Git namespace.
设置 Git 命名空间。
Set the Git namespace; see <a0>gitnamespaces[7]</a0> for details.
设置 Git 命名空间;详见 <a0>gitnamespaces[7]</a0>
Set the path to the repository.
设置仓库的路径。
Set the path to the root of the working tree.
将路径设置为工作树的根。
Set the path to the working tree.
设置工作树的路径。
Set to 0 to prevent protocols used by fetch/push/clone which are configured to the <c0>user</c0> state.
设置为 0 以防止被配置为 <c0>user</c0> 状态的协议用于 fetch/push/clone 。
Set up a mirror of the source repository.
设置源仓库的镜像。
Sets of commits can also be given but no traversal is done by default, see <a1>git-rev-list[1]</a1> and its <c2>--no-walk</c2> option.
也可以给出提交集，但默认情况下不进行遍历，请参见 <a1>git-rev-list[1]</a1> 及其 <c2>--no-walk</c2> 选项。
Sets or deletes the default branch (i.e. the target of the symbolic-ref <c0>refs/remotes/<name>/HEAD</c0>) for the named remote.
设置或删除命名的远程的默认分支(即 symbolic-ref <c0>refs/remotes/<name>/HEAD</c0> 的目标)。
Setting <c4>gc.autoPackLimit</c4> to 0 disables automatic consolidation of packs.
将 <c4>gc.autoPackLimit</c4> 设置为 0 将禁用包的自动合并。
Setting the <c0>mergetool.keepBackup</c0> configuration variable to <c1>false</c1> causes <c2>git mergetool</c2> to automatically remove the backup as files are successfully merged.
将 <c0>mergetool.keepBackup</c0> 配置变量设置为 <c1>false</c1> 会导致 <c2>git mergetool</c2> 在文件成功合并时自动移除备份。
Setting the value of <c2>gc.auto</c2> to 0 disables automatic packing of loose objects.
将 <c2>gc.auto</c2> 的值设置为 0 将禁用自动打包松散的对象。
Setting this variable to <c0>1</c0> will cause Git to treat all pathspecs as case-insensitive.
将此变量设置为 <c0>1</c0> 将导致 Git 将所有路径选项视为不区分大小写。
Setting this variable to <c0>1</c0> will cause Git to treat all pathspecs as glob patterns (aka "glob" magic).
将此变量设置为 <c0>1</c0> 将导致 Git 将所有 pathspecs 视为 glob 模式(又称"glob"魔术)。
Setting this variable to <c0>1</c0> will cause Git to treat all pathspecs as literal (aka "literal" magic).
将此变量设置为 <c0>1</c0> 将导致 Git 将所有 pathspecs 视为文字（也称为"文字"魔术）。
Setting this variable to <c0>1</c0> will cause Git to treat all pathspecs literally, rather than as glob patterns.
将此变量设置为 <c0>1</c0> 将导致 Git 以字面方式处理所有的路径，而不是以 glob 模式。

在输出中显示已修改的文件
Show only commits that are enough to explain how the files that match the specified paths came to be.
仅显示足以解释与指定路径匹配的文件的提交。
Show only ignored files in the output.
在输出中仅显示被忽略的文件。
Show only modification, rename, and copy, but not addition or deletion.
仅显示修改，重命名和复制，但不显示添加或删除。
Show only names and the nature of change, but not actual diff output.
仅显示名称和更改的性质，但不显示实际的差异输出。
Show other (i.e. untracked) files in the output
在输出中显示其他(即未跟踪)文件
Show packed archive index
显示打包的归档索引
Show staged contents' mode bits, object name and stage number in the output.
在输出中显示暂存内容的模式位，对象名称和阶段编号。
Show the branch and tracking info even in short-format.
以短格式显示分支和跟踪信息。
Show the changes during the last two weeks to the file <e0>gitk</e0>.
将最近两周内的对文件 <e0>gitk</e0> 的更改。
Show the changes recorded in the stash entry as a diff between the stashed contents and the commit back when the stash entry was first created.
将储藏条目中记录的更改，显示为已存储的内容和当存储空间条目首次创建时的提交后的差异。
Show the commits that are in the "test" branch but not yet in the "release" branch, along with the list of paths each commit modifies.
显示“test”分支中尚未在“release”分支中的提交，以及每个提交修改的路径列表。
Show the number of entries currently stashed away.
显示当前被暂存的条目数。
Show the whole commit history, but skip any merges
显示整个提交历史记录，但跳过任何合并
Show the working tree status
显示工作树状态

显示三向合并而不用触摸索引
Show unified diff between the HEAD commit and what would be committed at the bottom of the commit message template to help the user describe the commit by reminding what changes the commit has.
在 HEAD 提交和提交消息模板底部提交的内容之间显示统一的差异，以帮助用户通过提醒提交所做的更改来描述提交。
Show untracked files.
显示未跟踪的文件。
Show various types of objects
显示各种类型的对象

显示文件每一行的最后一次修订版本和作者

显示将做什么，但不做任何更改。

显示给定分支唯一的提交

显示所有本地分支中的所有提交，但不包括任何 <e0>origin</e0> 的远程跟踪分支中(您有的但 origin 没有的)。
Shows all commits that are in local master but not in any remote repository master branches.
显示本地 master 中的所有提交，但不在任何远程仓库的 master 分支。
Shows how the function <c0>main()</c0> in the file <c1>main.c</c1> evolved over time.
显示文件 <c1>main.c</c1> 中的函数 <c0>main()</c0> 随着时间的推移而发展。
Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits).
显示一个或多个对象(blobs，树，标签和提交)。
Shows the commit logs.
显示提交日志。
Shows the commits that changed <c0>builtin/rev-list.c</c0>, including those commits that occurred before the file was given its present name.
显示更改 <c0>builtin/rev-list.c</c0> 的提交，包括在文件被赋予其现有名称之前发生的提交。
Shows the contents of the file <c0>Documentation/README</c0> as they were current in the 10th last commit of the branch <c1>next</c1>.
显示文件 <c0>Documentation/README</c0> 的内容，在分支 <c1>next</c1> 当前提交之前第10次提交。
Shows the history including change diffs, but only from the “main branch” perspective, skipping commits that come from merged branches, and showing full diffs of changes introduced by the merges.
显示历史，包括变化差异，但仅从“主分支”的角度，忽略来自合并分支的提交，并显示合并引入的变化的完全差异。
Shows the subject of the commit pointed to by the tag <c0>v1.0.0</c0>.
显示标签 <c0>v1.0.0</c0> 指定的提交的主题。
Shows the tag <c0>v1.0.0</c0>, along with the object the tags points at.
显示标签 <c0>v1.0.0</c0> ，以及标签指向的对象。
Shows the tree pointed to by the tag <c0>v1.0.0</c0>.
显示标签 <c0>v1.0.0</c0> 指向的树。
Similar to <c0>--file</c0> but use the given blob instead of a file.
与 <c0>--file</c0> 类似，但使用给定的 blob 而不是文件。

类似地，可以修改现有添加或修改的"+"行。

简单的 UNIX mbox 分割程序
Skip <e0>number</e0> commits before starting to show the commit output.
在开始显示提交输出之前跳过 <e0>number</e0> 条。
Skip move or rename actions which would lead to an error condition.
跳过移动或重命名可能导致错误状态的操作。
Small fixups like bumping release/version name would be acceptable.
小修复，如碰撞释放/版本名称将是可以接受的。

一些退出代码是：
Some git commands may automatically run <e0>git gc</e0>; see the <c1>--auto</c1> flag below for details.
一些 git 命令可以自动运行 <e0>git gc</e0> ;有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 <c1>--auto</c1> 标志。
Some git commands run <c1>git gc --auto</c1> after performing operations that could create many loose objects.
执行可能创建许多松散对象的操作后，一些 git 命令会运行 <c1>git gc --auto</c1> 。
Some of these checks may restrict the characters allowed in a branch name.
其中一些检查可能会限制分支名称中允许的字符。
Some of these checks may restrict the characters allowed in a tag name.
其中一些检查可能会限制标签名称中允许的字符。
Some strategies can also take their own options, which can be passed by giving <c4>-X<option></c4> arguments to <c5>git merge</c5> and/or <c6>git pull</c6>.
某些策略也可以采用自己的选项，通过将 <c4>-X<option></c4> 参数赋值给 <c5>git merge</c5> 和/或 <c6>git pull</c6> 。
Some variables may appear multiple times; we say then that the variable is multivalued.
一些变量可能会出现多次;那么我们说这个变量是多值的。

Some workflows require that one or more branches of development on one machine be replicated on another machine, but the two machines cannot be directly connected, and therefore the interactive Git protocols (git, ssh, http) cannot be used.
一些工作流程要求在一台机器上的一个或多个开发分支复制在另一台机器上，但是两台机器无法直接连接，因此不能使用交互式 Git 协议(git，ssh，http)。
Sometimes you are only interested in parts of the history, for example the commits modifying a particular <path>.
有时您只对历史的部分感兴趣，例如修改特定<path>的提交。
Sort based on the key given.
根据给定的键进行排序。
Sorting and filtering branches are case insensitive.
排序和过滤分支不区分大小写。
Sorting and filtering tags are case insensitive.
排序和过滤标签不区分大小写。
Specifies which refs to fetch and which local refs to update.
指定要获取的引用和更新哪些本地引用。
Specify a web browser that may be used by some commands.
指定某些命令可能使用的 Web 浏览器。
Specify an explicit author using the standard <c0>A U Thor <author@example.com></c0> format.
使用标准的 <c0>A U Thor <author@example.com></c0> 格式指定一个明确的作者。
Specify the directory from which templates will be used; (See the "TEMPLATE DIRECTORY" section of <a0>git-init[1]</a0>.)
指定使用模板的目录; (参见 <a0>git-init[1]</a0> 的"TEMPLATE DIRECTORY"部分。)
Specify what destination ref to update with what source object.
指定要使用源对象更新的目标引用。
Specifying <c0>-b</c0> causes a new branch to be created as if <a1>git-branch[1]</a1> were called and then checked out.
指定 <c0>-b</c0> 将创建一个新的分支，就像调用了 <a1>git-branch[1]</a1> ，然后检出。
Specifying <c1>--no-local</c1> will override the default when <c2>/path/to/repo</c2> is given, using the regular Git transport instead.
当使用 <c2>/path/to/repo</c2> 时，指定 <c1>--no-local</c1> 会覆盖默认值，使用正常的 Git 传输。
Specifying a directory will include all unresolved files in that path.
指定目录将包括该路径中的所有未解析文件。
Spend extra cycles to find renames, copies and complete rewrites (very expensive).
花费额外的周期来查找重命名，复制和完成重写(非常昂贵)。

将提交分解成一系列提交
